text: Claudemir Jerônimo Barreto (born 27 March 1981), known as Cacau (, ), is a German former football player of Brazilian descent. He plays for VfB Stuttgart and Germany national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup League Cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Türk Gücü München 2000–01 Landesliga 31 7 — — — 31 7 1\.
